mapper.select: select a.*,b.prdt_nm from (select o.order_no ,o.recv_dt ,o.prog_info ,o.paprd_dt ,d.prdt_cd ,d.order_qty ,d.indica_qty ,d.oust_qty ,d.prdt_stc from order_tb o join order_d d on o.order_no=d.order_no) a join prdt b on a.prdt_cd=b.prdt_cd where a.order_no = #{orderNo}
select o.order_no ,o.recv_dt ,o.prog_info ,o.paprd_dt ,c.co_nm ,dcnt('order_tb',o.order_no) as deNum from order_tb o join co c on o.co_cd=c.co_cd
